Package org.cpnsim.interscheduler

Class InterSchedulerLeastRequested

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.interscheduler.InterSchedulerSimple
org.cpnsim.interscheduler.InterSchedulerLeastRequested
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatacenterEntity, Identifiable, Nameable, InterScheduler
public class InterSchedulerLeastRequested extends InterSchedulerSimple
The least requested inter-scheduler. It is extended from the InterSchedulerSimple. It has changed the scheduleToDatacenter, scheduleToHost and scheduleMixed functions to implement the least requested scheduling strategy. The schedule algorithm is as follows:
  1. Sort the batch of requests that need to be scheduled and select the requests with the same resource requirement to schedule together in each scheduling round. For scheduleToHost, the type of request is instance, and for scheduleToDatacenter, the type of request is instance group.
  2. Screen out a certain number of suitable scheduling targets for the request starting from random positions and score them. Note that these scores are cached. For different requests, 100 suitable hosts are needed for scheduleToHost, while 3 data centers are needed for scheduleToDatacenter. The score is contingent on the remaining resource proportion of the target, with higher proportions yielding higher scores.
  3. Select the one with the highest score among all scheduling targets for scheduling.
For scheduleMixed function, it will first try to schedule the instance to the host in the data center where the inter-scheduler is located. If the scheduling fails, it will try to forward the instance to other data centers.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

    • getScoreForDc

      private double getScoreForDc(InstanceGroup instanceGroup, Datacenter datacenter, SimpleStateEasyObject simpleStateEasyObject)
      Get the score of the data center for the same instance group by the simple stateSimpleStateEasyObject. Score = (cpuAvailableSum * 10 / cpuCapacitySum + ramAvailableSum * 10 / ramCapacitySum) / 2 It refers to the calculation method of kubernetes.
      Parameters:
      instanceGroup - the instance group.
      datacenter - the data center.
      simpleStateEasyObject - the simple stateSimpleStateEasyObject of the data center.
      Returns:
      the score of the data center.

    • scheduleSameInstanceGroupByScoredDcs

      private void scheduleSameInstanceGroupByScoredDcs(List<InstanceGroup> sameInstanceGroups, InterSchedulerResult interSchedulerResult, ScoredDatacentersManager scoredDatacentersManager)
      Schedule a batch of same instance groups to the data centers by the scored data centers. It will allocate the resource to the data center with the highest score and update the score of the data center.
      Parameters:
      sameInstanceGroups - the same instance groups to be scheduled.
      interSchedulerResult - the result of the scheduling.
      scoredDatacentersManager - the scored data centers.

    • getScoreForHost

      private double getScoreForHost(Instance instance, int hostId, Datacenter datacenter, DetailedDcStateSimple detailedDcStateSimple)
      Get the score of the host for the instance. Score = (cpuAvailable * 10 / cpuCapacity + ramAvailable * 10 / ramCapacity) / 2
      Parameters:
      instance - the instance.
      hostId - the host id.
      datacenter - the data center.
      detailedDcStateSimple - the detailed state of the data center.
      Returns:
      the score of the host.

    • scheduleSameInstanceGroupsByScoredHosts

      private void scheduleSameInstanceGroupsByScoredHosts(List<InstanceGroup> sameInstanceGroups, InterSchedulerResult interSchedulerResult, ScoredHostsManager scoredHostsManager)
      Schedule a batch of same instance groups to the hosts by the scored hosts. It will schedule the instance to the host with the highest score and update the score of the host.
      Parameters:
      sameInstanceGroups - the same instance groups to be scheduled.
      interSchedulerResult - the result of the scheduling.
      scoredHostsManager - the scored hosts.
